nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
# Read me
This workflow monitor G2 reviews URLS. 

When a new review is published, it will: 
- trigger a Slack notification 
- record the review in Google Sheets


To install it, you'll need access to Slack, Google Sheets and ScrapingBee

### Full guide here: {{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Code Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Code Workflow. This workflow integrates 11 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, itemLists, markdown, code. It contains 18 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 18
- **Node Types**: 11
- **Error Handling**: âœ… Implemented
- **Security**: âœ… Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: âœ… Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Add your competitors here**: code
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Execute workflow every day**: scheduleTrigger
- **Get G2 data with ScrapingBee**: httpRequest
- **Get review section HTML**: html
- **Iterate on reviews**: itemLists
- **Extract structured data**: html
- **Convert Review HTML to Markdown**: markdown
- **Get all past reviews**: googleSheets
- ... and 8 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
